Player History

Injured on 5/21/2019 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...

Traded from Detroit to New York on 7/10/2022 (Going to DET: C Issac Scott, P Jason Saterfiel. Going to NY: SS Robert Guerriero, P Deangelo Montejano, C Leo Vinyals)...
Injured on 3/10/2024 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
